name: koreai
description: 1.Go to home directory   cd SDKApp 2.Install dependencies using following command   npm install  3.Download and then uncompress the Kore.ai Web SDK from https://github.com/Koredotcom/web-kore-sdk into the test application â€¦/sdk folder of the SDKApp test application. The Web SDK contains the libraries used to communicate and run the bot in the test application using the Web/Mobile Client channel. You will need to configure settings in the index.html file for your computer. 4.Start SDKApp   node startServer.js 5.Access the application in any browser using the following link  http://localhost:3000
